Here's the passage from Donald Rumsfeld 's`` Known and Unkwown'': After his sons were killed, there was an intelligence report that Saddam Hussein was paying$ 60 million for his agents to target the President Bush 's two daughters and my two daughters for reprisal attacks. That threat report was brought up at an NSC meeting in October 2003. I acknowledged it, but went on with our discussion. `` You need to take this seriously,'' President Bush said. `` Egypt recognises and appreciates the care and effort undertaken by the government of Germany to preserve and display the painted limestone bust of Queen Nefertiti,'' Zahi Hawass said in a statement. But he asked that this unique treasure be returned to the possession of its rightful owners, the Egyptian people.
